name: Chitambaram
description: Graduated from an Affiliated College of Anna University with a degree in Computer Science engineering. Numerous hands-on experience in software development, and the ability to solve problems in a timely and accurate manner, I enjoy being challenged and working on projects that require me to work outside my comfort zone and beyond knowledge, as continuing to learn and my contribution to your organization.

description: Chatbot that is Powered by api.ai for Facebook that fulfills customer need based on the requirements.

Hyperledger-Composer is a Framework from IBM to quickly develop Blockchain based Solutions.
ProjectPharma Mainly focuses to eliminate counterfeit drugs in the Pharma industry and also to increase the efficiency to the pharmaceutical industry.
The platform offers possibility to track pharmaceuticals through a supply chain that links digital systems to pharmaceuticals moving in the physical world.
The platform will create a network of Manufacturers, logistics, wholesalers and retailers and for each drug Exchange that all will be all Recorded.
The objective of this project is to Listen to millions of conversations over the web, triangulate information, analyze customer sentimental.
Engage the Customers through our Internet Scanner system that helps the business with effective customer service.

achievements: Got I prize in Symposium at MCET – Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology, Pollachi for the Technical events conducted at College Level on the Event HEPTATHION.

name: Test account
description: I am a computer engineering student from Cairo, Egypt, I love Programming, Developing, and Problem Solving. I am passionate about startups and entrepreneurship so I dream to start my own company from scratch, I love adventures & taking risks so every second I search for a new thing to do which will help me open up for new opportunities as well as teach me new ideas about life. I am searching for an internship which will help me increase my technical knowledge as well as develop my soft skills. To help me become a high-quality graduate in the market, give me experience looking for jobs, and help me become a future entrepreneur.
